content.rendered:
This technique, based on cerebral physiology, is the perfecting of ancient and empirical methods that brought results which were sometimes grandiose but often inconstant.
Usually, the subject feels a deep contact with a genuine occult force as soon as the first experiments are practiced. This technique is the only one that reveals so much so quickly.

excerpt.rendered: A companion book to ‟The Initiation of Pietro” focusing on the practical applications of the traditional Zoroasrian exercises described in the previous volume. Regular practice is the key to the awakening of supranormal psychic abilities and the manifestation of wondrous phenomena such as illumination, prophetic visions and phenomena of premonition and clairvoyance.
